name: Galactic Frenzy
description:
Help/How/What?

Start

The first time you run the game you'll be prompted to provide a name tag (4-12 characters in length), this is just used for keeping track of your records.

Mechanics

The mechanics of the game are fairly simple, you have two virtual joysticks, the left one controls the movement while the right one aims and shoots towards the given angle. There's also a shotgun/spread (toggle button) weapon that can be activated every time you kill 50 enemies, be careful as it runs out of ammo, and we also have the force-push/bomb (hold button) which clears all the enemies and bullets around you.

The game will introduce new enemies as you go on but you'll also get the chance to upgrade your weapons and recover HP.

Points

These are the main objective of the game, every time you kill an enemy you get 10 points and the multiplier is basically that, 10*multiplier. You can increment the multiplier by destroying enemies without getting hit, if you get hit it will reset to 1.

Leaderboard

Here you can see what the current top score is.

Options

General tab: section you can control the SFX and Music volume with some sliders. You can also disable glow and particles for performance improvements. If you prefer the joysticks to be static, you can disable the dynamic joystick option.

Control tab: Here you can control button size, dead zone, and joystick size
